author: KevinMarquette
body:
Some Pester tests in Utility/Get-Random need to be reviewed or refactored.

- [ ] use of `Should -Be (1 -or 2 -or 3 -or 5 -or 8 -or 13)` needs to be refactored, not a valid test
- [ ] use of `Should -Be @secondRandomNumber` should be `Should -Be $secondRandomNumber` and tested
title: Code Cleanup: Pester tests in Utility/Get-Random.Tests.ps1
